item.description:
Brownstone Realty Southcoast Rehabbing Tour - there is NO CHARGE for this tour!
Wednesday - March 27, 2013, 4:30 pm - 6:30 pm
We will be starting the tour at the Browstone Realty office at 302 Broadway in Raynham, MA. We will then head to 26 Fieldcrest, East Bridgewater, followed by 32 Gretchen Way, Raynham.
Back at the office we will:
Network, have some refreshments and drinks and we will debrief:
◦How we found the deal
◦How we funded it
◦How we determined our exit strategy
◦The numbers...
Please contact Kim Harrington at kimh@brownstonerg.com with any questions and to confirm registration for this event.

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Brownstone Realty Rehabbing Tour
